statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND maintenance_date = '2022-06-15'
DELETE FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE (repair_type = 'Engine Repair' OR repair_type = 'Transmission Repair') AND (repair_date >= '2022-01-01' AND repair_date <= '2022-06-30')
DELETE FROM service_history WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND vin = 'ABCD123456XYZ7890';
DELETE FROM service_history WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota') AND service_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM Maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND maintenance_cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM RepairRecord WHERE repair_date < '2022-01-01' AND repair_cost < 500;
